item.description:
GAME CANCELLED DUE TO WEATHER, TRY AGAIN NEXT WEEKEND, SORRY!

 

TOURNEY


Date: Saturday, Feb 9th
Time: 6:30pm
Buyin: $40 (no rebuys, $5 from buyin to pay for pizza, drinks, etc)
Starting Stack: 100,000 chips
Bonus Chips: 25,000 (arrive by 6:15pm)
Starting Blind Level: 1,000/2,000
# of Players: Up to two tables
Eats: Pizza by 6:45pm, water, soda and snacks provided. Extra fridge if you want to BYOB


CASH GAME (should start between 8-9pm)


Stakes: 1/2 NL
Min Buyin: $60
Max Buyin: $300 (or largest stack @ table)

Button Bonus: $25 (awarded when game starts)
Bad Beat Jackpot: $235, qualifier is losing with 8's full
Player Referals: $20 for each new player you bring to the cash game
Note: Cash game has a dedicated dealer, she works on tips alone and appreciates them!

OTHER NOTES


- smoking at the bottom stairs of the deck please (will have a can there for butts)
- coats can go on the back of your chair (not on couch please)
- come in through side door at deck
- we have cats in case you suffer from allergies!
- you may wear your shoes inside, we'll swiffer the floors after the event

ADDRESS


2 Omelia Rd, East Windsor

Anthony's Home Phone:  860-292-8983
Anthony's Cell Phone:  860-597-3776


- house is on the corner of a four-way intersection with Rye Street. Big brick building, large yard. Driveway is between the yellow fire hydrant and the mailbox (there's also a bench by the tree next to the mailbox)

Cash game is first come-first served. Please RSVP to lockup a seat for the tourney!

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: NL Hold Em Poker Tournament at Anthony's - CANCELLED DUE TO Blizzard!!!
